Hi Bill
=A0
You can make use of the archives to look up past posts by keywo=
rd searches. As for radio I get alot when Im not on a station. Or sweep tun=
ing which scans the entire band. Good luck with your research.

Misty

e dangerous.

 though I can seem to find his email.

ame idea and not being a radio person I really have no clue.=A0 But I wante=
d to also scan a given list of radio frequencies that are not use in my are=
a here in Philadelphia.=A0 
=A0
So I ask =A0if anyone in the ITC and EVP wo=
rld might have some insight or has had any luck with specific radio frequen=
cies that showed promise for ITC and or evps?=A0

If you could share yo=
u radio frequencies and experiences =A0

Thanks!
